text:
- Cepal Hallas is one of the
three mega services in Greece.

It manages about 26 billion
Euro assets under management,
and we employ about 1,000 people.
(upbeat music)

The current priority of my
organization within the firm
is to move to AWS cloud.
We are investing all our efforts there,
decommission our legacy platform
and move all our workflows to AWS.

In order for us to choose
our cloud platform,
we did a proof of concept,
out of which we drove some conclusions.
The first one, and most important,

was that our cloud partners
were available in Greece.
What AWS Greece is doing for us

is they're bringing us into
contact with other innovators
and other companies,
like-minded companies,
and help us move forward,
even in our own domain,
we learn things that we might not know.
I would say that I'm really impressed

by the quality of people
that AWS attracted in Greece,
the developers, the support staff,
the architects are the highest quality,
and they really helped us in our journey.

And the second was that the
capabilities of the cloud
that we chose, AWS,
was matching our team of developers,
data scientists and so on.
More agile, more hands-on, more technical.
AWS provide us a foundation

where the data science
and the engineering teams
can quickly implement ideas
and deliver results for our business.
We didn't have this before.

I am excited to see my
team continuously learning,
and AWS provides us with this capability.

And I also, I'm personally
excited to play with new toys
that I get out of AWS.
(upbeat classical music)
